forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 11am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 87. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the soft embrace of a summer morning in Boston, the air carries an essence of anticipation, with clouds lazily draping the sky in shades of gray. A whisper of rain may linger until late morning, yet the promise of warmth beckons. By noon, the mercury will flirt with the eighty-seven mark, inviting denizens to shed the protective layers of winter wear. The southwest winds meander gently, encouraging one to breathe in the vitality of the day.

As dusk approaches, the clouds will part just enough to reveal a tranquil evening, with the temperature easing into a comfortable sixty-eight. In this moderate frame, a light jacket will suffice, perfect for strolling along the esplanade or perhaps indulging in a quiet moment at a café terrace. Boston hums with life, and whether one finds solace in the rustle of leaves in a nearby park or explores the unique offerings of a local shop, this day presents countless simple joys to embrace under the forgiving clouds.
